function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","Impact":"Mismanagement of the pandemic, ineffective response to high-risk patients, and failure to control the infection in real-time.","Mitigation":"Implementing blockchain technology and telemedicine to ensure accurate and trustworthy data collection and monitoring.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, telemedicine.","People":"Public health authorities, medical industry, patients.","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare professionals, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","Impact":"Threat to the accuracy and reliability of the data, potential spread of misinformation, and loss of trust in the technology.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust security protocols, encryption methods, and access controls to protect blockchain data from unauthorized manipulation.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology security features, encryption methods.","People":"Technology developers, data security experts.","Owner":"Technology developers, data security experts, organizations implementing blockchain technology."},{"Description":"Reliance on multiple technologies such as biosensors, 3D scanning, and multi-agent systems may introduce compatibility issues and data integration challenges.","Impact":"Interference with data collection and sharing, potential inaccuracies in tracking virus spread, and hindered coordination among multiple technological systems.","Mitigation":"Developing interoperability standards and data integration protocols to ensure seamless communication between different technologies.","Technologies":"Interoperability standards, data integration protocols.","People":"Technology developers, system integrators, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Technology developers, system integrators, healthcare organizations."}]}
